targets.rawSql: SELECT count() FROM events WHERE event_type = 'impression' AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT count() FROM events WHERE event_type = 'click' AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT round(countIf(event_type = 'click') / countIf(event_type = 'impression') * 100, 2) as ctr FROM events WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT round(sum(cost), 2) FROM events WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) as time, count() as impressions FROM events WHERE event_type = 'impression' AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) as time, count() as clicks FROM events WHERE event_type = 'click' AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT campaign_id, countIf(event_type = 'impression') as impressions, countIf(event_type = 'click') as clicks, round(countIf(event_type = 'click') / countIf(event_type = 'impression') * 100, 2) as ctr, round(sum(cost), 2) as spend FROM events WHERE campaign_id IS NOT NULL AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY impressions DESC

SELECT creative_id, countIf(event_type = 'impression') as impressions, countIf(event_type = 'click') as clicks, round(countIf(event_type = 'click') / countIf(event_type = 'impression') * 100, 2) as ctr FROM events WHERE creative_id IS NOT NULL AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY creative_id ORDER BY ctr DESC LIMIT 10
